remarks: Part (6) of [Baer] p. 47 line 6.  Note that we use ` -. X e. ( N `` { Y , Z } ) ` which is equivalent to Baer's "Fx ` i^i ` (Fy + Fz)" by ~ lspdisjb .  (Contributed by NM, 17-May-2015.)
statement:

hdmap1-6.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.

hdmap1l6 $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` <. X , F , ( Y .+ Z ) >. ) = ( ( I ` <. X , F , Y >. ) .+b ( I ` <. X , F , Z >. ) ) ) $.
